html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13572024-12-16FIN
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Fuel Charge Regulations, No. 2
PrecisRegulations Amending the FUEL CHARGE REGULATIONS, NO. 2 in order to (1) provide that the fuel charge is not payable by registered distributors on light fuel oil that is delivered exclusively for use in providing heat to a home, building or similar structure; (2) include minor consequential technical amendments, which are analogous to existing technical provisions in the fuel charge system; and (3) include technical rules related to the fuel charge applicable in respect of light fuel oil that is held during the temporary pause period and after it ends in 2027.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0282 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FUEL CHARGE REGULATIONS, NO. 2 in order to (1) provide that the fuel charge is not payable by registered distributors on light fuel oil that is delivered exclusively for use in providing heat to a home, building or similar structure; (2) include minor consequential technical amendments, which are analogous to existing technical provisions in the fuel charge system; and (3) include technical rules related to the fuel charge applicable in respect of light fuel oil that is held during the temporary pause period and after it ends in 2027.
